articles.author: Filip Cleeren
articles.title: Perez: Sainz would have "absolutely" won F1 Australian GP against Verstappen - Motorsport.com
articles.description: Red Bull driver Sergio Perez believes Ferrari's Carlos Sainz would "absolutely" have won Formula 1's Australian GP even if Max Verstappen hadn't hit trouble.
articles.content: Polesitter Verstappen reported a stuck brake from the start of the Melbourne race and after the issue made him lose the lead to Sainz on lap 2, the Dutchman's right rear brake finally gave up on lap … [+2022 chars]
